smoking-tracker.description: Smoking Tracker is an easy to use smoking tracking app that helps you understand your habits and progress towards quitting. Every cigarette you smoke is clearly recorded, giving you detailed insight into your daily, weekly and monthly patterns
smoking-tracker.description-text-1: The app allows you to visualize your data through weekly, monthly, and yearly graphs, so you can quickly identify your habits. Based on this data, you can make more informed decisions about how to reduce or control the number of cigarettes you smoke
smoking-tracker.description-text-2: All data is stored locally on your device, ensuring privacy and security. If desired, you can also enable automatic backups to keep your data safe even when you change devices. The application supports multilingualism and is available in Slovenian and English, with an intuitive user interface that is friendly to both beginners and advanced users
smoking-tracker.description-text-3: In addition to tracking and visualizing your progress, the app helps you understand long term trends and smoking patterns, which is key to planning changes and achieving your goals. Simply tracking your daily consumption gives you better control over your habits
smoking-tracker.description-text-hyper: Download the app today and start tracking your consumption!

features.text-1: Local data storage for greater privacy
features.text-2: Daily, monthly and yearly statistics with graphs
features.text-4: Multi language support: English and Slovenian

card-generator.description: Card Generator is a desktop application for creating and generating custom cards. Using Excel spreadsheets and customizable fxml templates, you can quickly create entire sets of cards without having to design each card individually
card-generator.description-text-1: You enter all the data, such as name, power, description and special features, into Excel, and the application automatically generates professionally designed cards based on your fxml template. You can export the finished cards as jpg or png images
card-generator.description-text-2: Card Generator is designed with an intuitive user interface, real time visual preview, and full control over element layout. Projects and templates are stored locally, ensuring privacy and reliability while working
card-generator.description-text-hyper: Create themed board game kits and prototypes quickly, efficiently, and fully customized!

features.text-1: Excel based data input for automatic card generation
features.text-3: Export cards as jpg or png images
